resources.string: "Contacts permissions are needed for providing email completions."
Recommendations for people to contact based on your message history

%1$s Hello %2$s, This is your %3$s entry. Great job! As you know, using a mood app as a daily journal can help us all to have an ongoing insight into our physical and mental health. MedLog offers you the option to share your mood journal with the HealthCareProvider of your choice. Providing your doctor with a mood chart can help the health care provider understand your mental health more completely, instead of just evaluating a snapshot of you as you appear on the day of your appointment. This information can help you and your health care provider collaborate to come up with best course of treatment.
